#summary Function/Class Reference for ID3v1.

= PHP-Reader ID3v1 Function Reference =

== Introduction ==

     PHP-Reader's ID3v1 implementation is ID3v1.0 and ID3v1.1 standards compliant. This is a reference of the built in items specifically for ID3v1. For a full function reference please use the Main Function Reference Page.

== Class/Function Reference ==

=== Class: ID3v1 ===
   * _Documentation location:_ <[http://code.google.com/p/php-reader/downloads/list package]>/docs/php-reader/ID3/ID3v1.html
   * _Source location:_ <[http://code.google.com/p/php-reader/downloads/list package]>/src/ID3v1.php
   * _Author:_ Sven Vollbehr <sven.vollbehr@behrss.eu>
   * _Requires:_
      * /Reader.php
      * /Transform.php
      * /Reader/Exception.php
----
*Class Variables:*
   * static $genres = array ([http://code.google.com/p/php-reader/wiki/ID3v1GenreList Genre List])
      * Access: Public.
      * Description: genre list.
----
*Class Methods:*
   * constructor `__construct (string $filename)`
      * Access: Public.
      * Description: Constructs the ID3v1 class with given file.
      * Parameters: string $filename The file name of the media file.

   * method `getAlbum ()`
      * Access: Public.
      * Description: Returns string containing the album field.

   * method `getArtist ()`
      * Access: Public.
      * Description: Returns string containing the artist field.

   * method `getComment ()`
      * Access: Public.
      * Description: Returns string containing the comment field.

   * method `getGenre ()`
      * Access: Public.
      * Description: Returns string containing the genre field as read from [http://code.google.com/p/php-reader/wiki/ID3v1GenreList the genre list].

   * method `getTitle ()`
      * Access: Public.
      * Description: Returns string containing the title field.

   * method `getTrack ()`
      * Access: Public.
      * Description: Returns integer containing the track field.
      * Since: ID3v1.1.

   * method `getYear ()`
      * Access: Public.
      * Description: Returns string containing the year field.

   * method `write ()`
      * Access: Public.
      * Description: Writes current data back to media file.

   * method `__get (string $name)`
      * Access: Public.
      * Description: Magic function so that $obj->value will work.
      * Parameters: string $name The field name.
